tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SensorData (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    value FLOAT
)
CREATE TABLE Sensors (sensor_id INT, sensor_name VARCHAR(50), sensor_location VARCHAR(100), data_type VARCHAR(50), data_value FLOAT);
CREATE TABLE Devices (device_id INT, device_name VARCHAR(50), device_type VARCHAR(50), device_location VARCHAR(100), active BOOLEAN);
CREATE TABLE SensorData (data_id INT, sensor_id INT, data_value FLOAT, data_timestamp TIMESTAMP, anomaly_flag BOOLEAN);

CREATE TABLE sensors (sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
              sensor_name VARCHAR(50),
              location VARCHAR(100),
              data_type VARCHAR(50),
              last_updated TIMESTAMP);

CREATE TABLE sensor_data (data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
                   sensor_id INT,
                   data_value FLOAT,
                   recorded_at TIMESTAMP,
                   FOREIGN KEY (sensor_id) REFERENCES sensors(sensor_id));

CREATE TABLE suspicious_patterns (pattern_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
                        pattern_name VARCHAR(50),
                        description VARCHAR(255),
                        created_at TIMESTAMP);

CREATE TABLE sensor_logs (log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
                   sensor_id INT,
                   log_message TEXT,
                   logged_at TIMESTAMP,
                   FOREIGN KEY (sensor_id) REFERENCES sensors(sensor_id));

CREATE TABLE sensors (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(100),
    data_type VARCHAR(50),
    status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE sensor_data (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    data_value FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (sensor_id) REFERENCES sensors(id)
);

CREATE TABLE alerts (
    alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    alert_message VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    device_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES devices(device_id)
);
